question: Agar to‘g‘ri burchakli uchburchakning katetlari 8 sm va 15 sm bo‘lsa, uning yuzini toping.
5, 12, 15, 20 va 30 sonlarining o‘rtacha arifmetik qiymatini toping.
Agar aylananing radiusi 10 sm bo‘lsa, uning perimetrini toping. (π ning qiymati 3.14 sifatida foydalaning).
Agar kubning tomoni 4 sm bo‘lsa, uning hajmini toping.
Soatning 6:00 vaqtida, soat strelkalari qanday burchak hosil qiladi?
Agar aylananing radiusi 7 sm bo‘lsa, uning yuzini toping. (π ning qiymati 3.14 sifatida foydalaning).
Agar ikkita to‘g‘ri chiziq kesishsa va ularning orasidagi burchak 45° bo‘lsa, qancha burchak hosil bo‘ladi?
Agar to‘g‘ri burchakli to‘rtburchakning uzunligi 14 sm, eni esa 7 sm bo‘lsa, uning perimetrini toping.
Agar to‘g‘ri burchakli to‘rtburchakning uzunligi 12 sm, eni esa 9 sm bo‘lsa, uning yuzini toping.
8 tomonli to‘g‘ri ko‘pburchakda qancha diaqonali bor?
-5 va 5 orasida qancha butun sonlar bor?
